Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Addison/Nottingham
ShortDescription: #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Harlem, Irving Park, Oak Park, due to street blockage near Addison/Nottingham.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Harlem, Irving Park, Oak Park, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Addison/Nottingham.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.
